author: senh
title: Rock of Ages loop thriller hike of Columbia River Gorge
text: BING NEWS: Rock of Ages loop thriller hike of Columbia River Gorge If Munra Point is the killer hike of the Columbia River Gorge, the Rock of Ages loop is the thriller hike of the same place. Munra Point got some publicity early this spring on this website when it lived up to its setting: gorgeous in the gorge.
